abstract: Coca-Cola won approval from the United States and Canada to buy the North American operations of its largest bottler on the condition that it safeguards rival Dr Pepper Snapple Group’s confidential business information, Reuters said.
snippet: Coca-Cola won approval from the United States and Canada to buy the North American operations of its largest bottler on the condition that it safeguards rival Dr Pepper Snapple Group’s confidential business information, Reuters said.
lead_paragraph: Coca-Cola won approval from the United States and Canada to buy the North American operations of its largest bottler on the condition that it safeguards rival Dr Pepper Snapple Group‘s confidential business information, Reuters said.

headline.main: U.S. Approves Coca-Cola’s Buy of Big Bottler
